name: Trapmania
description: Run, Trap, Defend. Fearsome monsters have invaded! Your job? Cleanse the land of these horrible beasts using only your mind, and the traps in your backpack...

name: King and Country
description: King and Country is an ambitious Real-Time Strategy game set during the bloodiest time in all of human history. Massive regimes spread their forces like wildfire as players fight a war the likes of which humanity has never seen since.

name: Orb Overload
description: Go on a adventure through outer space in Orb Overload. Play, make and discover planets in this journey to get back to your ship while not dying from oxygen by connecting to Orbs!

name: Mars Colony Builder
description: Discover a whole new world with Mars City Builder! Construct roads, erect buildings customize the city and take care of its safety. After all, you are the first Martian settler and this is a vast, unknown land. Develop it in any way you please!

name: Gonne Wrong
description: Its a zombie mode action fps shooter game based on stunning story.

name: Shodo
description: Be the master of your martial art. Enter the universe of psychic command of Chaos Magic, where your in-game strength relies solely on your strength within. Combine creativity and strategy to engineer the perfect combat art, and command your style to victory in a VR experience unlike any other.

name: Sin Survivor
description: Sin Survivor is a wave-based, first-person co-operative or single-player shooter based in a post-apocalyptic world overrun with blood-hungry, satanic demons.

name: Rogue North
description: A tactical shooter that has you fight to survive against a military occupation as well as a growing nuclear winter. Prepare accordingly, there's a long walk ahead of you.

name: Mygnar
description: In this top-down action game, you are a mage who seeks knowledge in the depths of a dungeon. Find the keys, unlock new levels and face increasingly powerful monsters. Finish the dungeon and unlock the "Blast Magic" spell! Or just get the highest score.

name: Cold Wind
description: Cold Wind is a first-person game where you are going to experience yourself what it feels like to be homeless. You will be exploring a large winter city looking for food, saving yourself from cold and wind at a fire.

name: Rythenia
description: A Retro Action-Adventure Role-Playing Game about the journey of four heroes trying to recover an ancient and long lost relic to consecrate the split of Rythenia Empire into four kingdoms for the emperor's heirs.

name: Darkness Arrives
description: A Horror based cartoon style game that has Nightmare levels you need to complete in the right order

name: Shoebill
description: Shoebill is a platformer that plunges you into a world called The Void and tells the story of Shiro.

name: Glory Hold
description: Glory Hold is besieged again, sire...Surely you remember you must lead the defense? I can’t wait to see you wielding the Great Bow. Your aim has always been so…magnificent. Yes. Truly remarkable. We have nothing to fear at all I’m sure.

name: In Between
description: In Between is a first person story adventure game about a lonely man and his near death experience.

name: Tasty Arena
description: Tasty Arena is a dynamic First Person Shooter. Choose your arsenal from a multitude of weapons, and face delicious enemies through different destinations.

name: Mark Twain's Tom Sawyer: Survival Game
description: Mark Twain's Tom Sawyer-based survival game

name: From Day to Day
description: The game "From Day To Day" is a psychological thriller in the first person. You bought a seemingly ordinary abandoned house to start life with a clean slate after the tragic events in your family.

name: Pizza Empire
description: In this tycoon you’ll start by picking a spot for your pizza place, then hire some staff, contract suppliers and create your first menu. Understand your customers and deal with the mafia to expand. Soon your small pizzeria will grow into a true pizza empire spanning across the city.

name: Construction Worker Simulator
description: Construction Worker Simulator is an ultra-realistic simulation game that let’s the player experience the life of a full-time construction worker. Make the city grow by your own hands!

name: Route 66 Simulator
description: Have you ever dreamed about leaving everything behind and setting out on epic road trip across the United States? Get a budget, build your car and make your dream come true! Try to survive in the most famous road in the world!

name: Aka Ninja VR
description: Very bloody and exciting cut people VR game. You can cut enemies at will like in reality. Each level has a large number of ninjas surrounding and attacking you. One person challenges a group of people. You must use excellent swordsmanship to pass the level.

name: Particubes
description:
Particubes is a free-to-play game creation platform where you can build your own cube-based games, and share them with your friends.

Thanks to its integrated code environment and its voxel editor, you gain the ability to create and edit your games directly on the application, without downloading anything else! Build, test and fix right in the app on your phone or computer.

name: Antibody
description: A love letter to ‘80s arcade shooters. Pilot a nimble spacecraft as you balance staying alive, defending friendly critters and fighting an ever-encroaching viral enemy. Upgrade your ship and become Sanguon’s ultimate protector. End the Viroid menace. You are the cure.

name: Surreatripus
description: Surreatripus is an action platformer with an unusual abstract psychedelic atmosphere. QUEST mode -> Travel through surreal worlds in search of artifacts. ARENA mode -> Use artifacts to improve combat performance.

name: Freiwillig
description: Join the ranks of the volunteer fire department in Tübingen, Germany, and defend the city from evil-doers through arcade puzzle action! Use the falling blocks to create reaction chains for big points!

name: Weltreich: Political Strategy Simulator
description: Rule the state, lead politics, strategize in this simulator. You can choose your wn political direction.

name: Escape Together
description: Escape Together or Die Trying

name: Project Rayssus
description: Mechanic Action MMOTPS Project Rayssus Customize your own Rayssus and use your weapons, actions, and skills to be active on the battlefield.

name: Doggo Quest
description: Doggo Quest is a quirky watercolored RPG featuring a lost dog trying to find its way home.

name: Ozark
description: A search and rescue gone wrong, crash landing in a remote mountain. A derelict facility, signals lost. Nothing is quite as it seems. Fight for your life in this side-scrolling action adventure and unravel the mysteries that lie beneath.

name: Stay Lit, Find Radio
description: Stay Lit, Find Radio is a survival, clue seeking, ghost avoiding, radio finding simulator game based in a haunted forest. It is a slow burn game for people who enjoy walking around and finding clues during the day, and being haunted during the night.

name: Le Frenchie
description: A 2.5D Action-Adventure Platform Game

name: Hostile Mars
description: Hostile Mars is a Tower-Defense Factory-Building game. You must create efficient supply chains, salvage destroyed enemies, and upgrade structures to support your gigantic cannons that defend your base against thousands of enemies.

name: Little Monkeys Eat Bananas
description: Run, jump, cling, and climb your way through this monkey-themed 2D Platformer. Jump on baddies to defeat them as you collect bananas to gain lives, regain health, or THROW AT THE BADDIES?!? And don't forget to collect the hidden Golden Banana Coins in each level to unlock a special secret...

name: AI Hunter
description: Hunter 1 game is a shooting game.When the female hunter hits the rabbit and fox in the deep forest gets some points. When the score reaches a certain value, the game will reward the player with virtual gold coins and diamonds.Players press the left mouse key to let female hunters shoot.

name: Redneck Party
description: Hello Fellas! I'm talkin' Redneck Party. Show off your skills as you fix and upgrade some serious horsepower. Customise your wheels by painting body colors, selecting stickers and much more. All brakes are out. Enjoy the party!

name: Dreamlight
description: Dreamlight is a 2D exploration sandbox with a survival aspects and a random world generation

name: Ai Yu Ming De Bi Duan
description: Sin descripción

name: Yachu Dice
description: Yachu Dice a tabletop dice game based on Yahtzeesupports LAN multiplayer up to 4 players

name: Pteranodon's Flight: The Flying Dinosaur Game
description: Welcome to Pteranodon's Flight! Dip, dive, swoop and soar as you hunt for prey, weave through jagged rocks and brave an erupting volcano! Be careful, though! You might actually learn something!

name: The Enemy Below
description: Escape from the depths of a top-secret research facility as you slash through creatures like giant mutant aliens, robot demons, and countless other experiments gone wrong. Inspired by classic games like Half-Life, Quake, and Doom, The Enemy Below raises the bar of what a modern retro-FPS can be.

name: City Sniper
description: This is a first person shooting game. The player plays a soldier,Players are surrounded by enemies, and they are free to explore the surrounding areas,Players can dodge the enemy's attack, or kill the enemy to survive as much as possible.

name: Gogoo
description: Take up the challenge and face fast pace platforming in Gogoo! you need to master the technique of jumping and timing. You are the hero! help yourself through the ingenious and tricky levels.

name: Your Fear
description: You must find your daughter and wife in a hospital where everyone turns into a light sensitive monster caused by an odd epidemic.

name: Consortya
description: The game features social spaces where real musical artists will be performing live music. The adventure and combat bolster this experience and allow Balancers to collect hidden songs from upcoming performers. Consortya is being designed and developed by Andy Martin of indie studio Moonlight Games, LLC.

name: Starseed
description:
Starseed aims to slightly twist the peaceful, calming farm sim archetype. "A farm sim with dark undertones and an isolated atmosphere" - would be a fitting description.

It is still, in sense, a peaceful sim without combat, but this time there's no relationships to build, your interactions are with your helper robots and with mission control back on Earth. You are millions of miles from the people you're trying to save.

name: Gear Stalker
description: VR post apocalyptic giant robot hunting game

name: Block Destruction
description: Want some destructions? Have fun destroying this cubic world. Different maps and weapons for you to have fun with. Slow down time, pause time to enjoy it more. Editor is available for you to play around!

name: Ninja Scarf
description: It's okay to cry--as long as you save the day, right? Join Cry, a young ninja, as he overcomes his shy nature to stand against a powerful threat. Journey through each exciting area, master four unique weapons and, most importantly, make your dear father proud in this 2D action platformer!

name: Proto Cuckoo 64
description: Save the Eggs in this 8-bit Inspired Arcade Puzzler!

name: Dual Guns Fantasy
description: "Dual Guns Fanstasy" is a simple and short shooting game with a arcade game style, it has a time-crisis style weapon system, the special effect of the body being hit by a bullet, and enemies from the fantasy world.

name: Assimilation X
description: Embody the simulation of a dead mysterious man as he is revived as part of Project Engram. Descend down the various levels of the increasingly mind-bending twisted simulation in order to destroy this electronic universe and end the suffering of millions. The Ultimate Platformer!

name: KabochaFarm
description: This is a casual game that takes 5 minutes per game. It's a simple job of sorting vegetables flowing over the conveyor! Watch the jack-o-lanterns get into an off-the-field brawl outside of Halloween that you didn't expect!

name: Keep Wall
description: Blocked bullets of tanks by blocks of trucks, keep wall with a full of blocks

name: HTD
description: HTD is a mix of classic party-based RPG and fast-paced real-time action. Control a party consisting of healer, tank and damage dealer, each immensely powerful in their specific role, and use their strengths to take down horrific enemies while journeying through a dark story of mystery and madness.

name: No Man is an Island
description: Zombie virus swept the world, the infected people were isolated to some closed islands. Some organizations hold zombie hunting competitions. In a hunting, you're infected with the virus and abandoned on an island. The hunt is not over and you've gone from hunter to prey.

name: Paths & Danger
description:
Paths & Danger is a procedural turn-based RPG with a dark twist. Join in on an adventure where you must gather a balanced group of heroes to embark on a series of quests and uncover the great mystery surrounding the province of Westwall.

To complete each quest, you must travel many paths in which you have to deal with random encounters and different situations and make the best of it.
Upon completing many quests, you must hire and recruit new members for your party, each with different skills. You can also increase the success of your adventures by improving your character's gear and equipment. Plus, pack up all sorts of potions, loot precious gems and gold to help you along the journey.

name: Paradise Away
description: Manage a group of survivals in this base building game set in a tropical island! Will you be able to escape from the island?

name: Pop-It! Or Don't..
description: Pop-It! Or Don't.. Is an addictive, fast paced, physics based, balloon popping click-fest! Keep popping balloons until the timer runs out to advance to the next round. Can you pop them all?

name: Kill Demons
description: A classic round RPG role-playing game. Key control role movement, enter or space bar to pick up items, dialogue NPC.

name: Friendly Arena
description: If you ever wanted a chaotic multiplayer game, Friendly Arena is all about that, it's a casual, physics based and multiplayer game with up to 20 players and set in fun/chaotic minigames

name: Galactic Speed Legends
description: Buy a craft or build a new one from the scratch, bet it, repair it, upgrade it, push it to the limit and take high-speed turns like never before. Prepare yourself to challenge elite drivers in the galaxy through a series of championships, and personal head to head races.

name: Underworld Memories
description: Each death is a new life experience! Underworld Memories is an Action Roguelike with changeable maps. Explore the Underworld in this 2D adventure without checkpoints. Learn from your mistakes and try again, again and again.

name: The Great Art Heist
description: You play as Jack a kid who loves art ever since he could remember. His parents took him to many museums when he was younger, ever since he has wanted to collect art pieces. Take on contracts or collect for yourself.

name: Pokon Factory Survival
description: Pokon Factory Survival is a 3D infinite world game. Mining resources, creating materials for spaceships, and escaping.

name: Kosta Projekt
description: A virus that attacks a handful of survivors and you who with the rest of hope will have to survive and maybe even save the world so you'd better find an antidote. The action takes place in the future in a post-apocalyptic world in one of the districts of Katowice - Kostuchna

name: Isometric World: Frame of Mind
description: In this game, you play as 15-year-old Cole Andrews on a journey through a Virtual Isometric 3D world. Using perspective and rotation, you have to make your way through the world to reach the emergency exit at the end. Just remember, everything is not what it seems...

name: Naera: It's Time to Retry
description: Naera: It's Time to Retry is a solo first person puzzle game, created by one-man development studio SHK Interactive using Unreal Engine. Each room is limited in time, use your power to slowdown the environnement and complete the test chamber.

name: Juno's Journey
description: Bark at your enemies! Rescue your friends! Spring into action! Will you find all the locked up puppies on Doggo Island? Journey like no dog before and become a husky hero!

name: Bunny Count
description: Capture The Flag , Team Deathmatch and Kill Confirmed are included as online and offline game modes! Its the Bunnies VS The Bears !

name: Troll Hunter VR
description: In Troll Hunter VR action-adventure, you explore harsh nature, study trolls, set traps, and hunt them down to protect civilians. Hunt for ghastly trolls in the alternative '80s Scandinavia, using your wit, trusty shotgun, and DIY devices.

name: Istoria
description: Istoria is a Story driven Turn-based Strategy Game. Follow Nemus Story, Customize your Characters and complete challenges.

name: Lands of Raynar
description: Take on the role of Karia and unveil the hidden truth of the past with your mysterious companion Ivy. Explore the Lands of Raynar as you take on enemies as they lead through Mórrí, a mythical creature of unknown origin.

name: Night Tail
description: There are monsters in the world that devours human memory and spirit, called dream monster. The protagonist, Yoru, has the power to fight against the dream monsters to dispel people's nightmares. To save everyone, Yoru decided to challenge "Paradise Manager", the manipulator of the dream monsters.

name: Traffic Command
description: Traffic Command - Take command of the traffic in the streets, redirecting cars, and telling them when it is okay to stop, and when it is okay to go.One big game of Red light green light keeps you on your feet in this addicting traffic driving game.

name: Dark Existence
description: Dark Existence is an upcoming multiplayer atmospheric horror game. You will be able to walk the halls of horror alongside your friends and share the horrifying experience together.

name: OGgolf
description: Golf a full 18 hole course, over canyons, across small islands, on a mountain, at the beach, in a swamp and more!!!! 2d open world golf island with wind, sand, water hazards, rough, fairway, green & out of bounds areas.

name: Evenorn
description: Evenorn is an atmospheric fast-paced 2D Jump & Run with precise mechanics and controls. Our intention is to challenge the player, without being unfair.

name: Insanium
description: A realtime strategy game with roguelike elements and an old school Spectrum 48k aesthetic. Can your crew overcome the killer ape rampaging aboard their starship?

name: Killstreak
description: Show your skills to the full on the battlefield

name: Battle Royale: For Your Heart!
description: A battle royale themed romance parody game! Select your avatar, player voice, gamertag, and possible duo partner, as you venture into an expansive virtual world alongside a colorful cast of characters.

name: Chroma
description: Zombies, medieval combat armor, sharp and pointy weapons... what's not to love? Chroma is based in Medieval Europe with one unique twist: the continent is overrun by the undead and you've been tasked with repelling The Horde. You're not the only one on the case though.

name: Power of Two
description: Local co-op fast-paced action game about pushing, dashing, and colliding. But there is always something more...

name: Highway Builder
description: Manage a construction company and plan, build or repair highways around the globe in a realistic simulator - Highway Builder

name: My Holiday 2
description: This is the second part of the long holiday of labor and capital! It tells the story of the protagonist's return to his hometown in the summer vacation three years after his previous work, but he is invaded by the meow man.

name: BlockBustersVR
description: Overview: With simple controls and familiar mechanics, this casual fun game will get everyone in your family to enjoy it within minutes. Complete the lines by yourself or with a friend in LAN co-op mode and work towards higher points and better combos!

name: Rubikingdom
description: Run your very own kingdom on a rubik's cube. Collect resources to develop your kingdom. Fight off raiders. Face events like famine, disease, and corruption of the land. Buy a favor from your god, pay tribute, or ignore them and feel their wrath. How long will you reign?

name: Anamnesis
description: Anamnesis is a roguelike card battler with a unique combo system, limit cards, elemental affinities, and strategic opportunities around every corner. With the option to keep one 'memory' after each run, get ready to customize your starter deck and experience deck building like never before.

name: Norsk: Epistle
description: Norsk: Epistle is an experimental singleplayer game. Set in the atmospheric abandoned Siberian town the game will introduce how to solve puzzles using second dimension in 3d world to understand what happened with humanity.

name: Sweets Memory
description: Sweets Memory - is a challenging memory game in which you have to find paired cards. The game is good for killing time and training your memory.

name: Obscury: The Last
description: Indie horror, where you have to go on a frightening and mystical adventure, as well as a notable fight for your own life. You will be able to plunge into the atmosphere where fear and danger prevail!

name: Pass to Hell
description: Pass to Hell is a game where your choices lead to consequences. You will become Death and you will decide who is worthy to go to Heaven and who is to Hell.

name: Brookhaven Grimoire
description: A Wizard has trapped you in a storybook, transporting you to the magical town of Brookhaven. With spells, swords, and the power of friendship, begin your new life in this strange land. But remember, escape may yet be possible for those who unravel this world’s mysteries...

name: Typing with Sharks
description: This action-packed, underwater adventure will help you master challenging keys on the keyboard. Type words quickly to zap hungry sharks and piranhas before they attack your submarine.

name: First Response
description: Welcome to your new job at the Extreme Containment Security Company! You've been selected by Malcolm Monaghan himself as the first subject in their brand new learning initiative! Upon your arrival, K.A.R.A. will guide you through the concepts of Cybersecurity and the important work you'll be doing!

name: Wreck the Insects
description: Wreck the Insects - An arcade-style shootem' up with a floral twist!

name: Gangster Empire: Vendetta
description: Ever secretly wanted to run your own Mafia organization, playing the role of a ruthless mob leader? Now you can with Gangster Empire: Vendetta!

name: Hazy
description: Hazy is a platform/puzzle game based in power-ups which tells the story of Tori in his journey of self-discovery while managing to save his city.

name: Escape from Dinosaur Island
description: RPG act adventure leisure game player plays a super boy who lives in the age of science and technology. In a flight mission, he crossed the dinosaur Volcano Island 65 million years ago, After a day and night , he successfully escaped from the Dinosaur Island. This game is developed for children's love of dinosaur theme.

name: Chicken Ranch
description: Chicken ranch is a top down ranch simulation game where you raise all kinds of birds in a world where every single bird is a different type of chicken. Take your farmer's Nordic fate into your own hands and raise every kind of chicken, oh and don't forget to fight off the floofs!

name: Supermarket Maker
description: Build and manage your very own Supermarket and make it success, with good offers and best selected products. Attract more customers with an aggressive strategy and grow to become the best Supermarket in town.

name: Struggling Ball
description: Struggling in lots of different levels which are challenging and beautiful.

name: Lovengrad
description: Become a Hunter in the terrifying Forest of Lovengrad. An unforgiving environment hides a monstrous Werewolf with different threads and mysterious creatures. Survive the Night against different Enemies and hunt the Werewolf down.

name: Watchman
description:
Immerse yourself in the depths of the subconscious of the main character, filled with a huge number of abstract images and traumatic memories. And find out what hides her inner world.

Watchman - Psychological horror in which you have to play for the watchman - an old, abandoned gym, where in the process of each night shift you have to face your fears and experiences, in a detailed atmosphere of a nightmare...

name: Fatal Error
description: Fatal Error is a real-time strategy game on the digital battlefields of a computer world under attack. With your TAC-AID and advanced programming, you must eliminate all threats to the Mainframe and take the fight to the viruses. Discover an abstract world of limitless potential…and lurking dangers.

name: Farlight Commanders
description: Drive a spaceship where each player has an unique role. Play Solo or Coop with friends, up to 4. A perfect mix of space shoot em up and sci-fi action platformer. Fight in space or ground.

name: Encounter the Light
description: 这是一个关于爱、梦想与信念的故事。 玩家需要扮演的是一位拥有进入病人梦境能力的心理医师，你将通过梦境中的只言片语与异常现象拼凑出埋藏在病人心底的桎梏，从而对症下药。 游戏将重心放在流畅细腻的叙事上，更近似于一部视觉小说。

name: Why It's Empty Here: The Game
description: Action-survival game set in a post-apocalyptic open-world teeming with various creatures. Explore the world devastated by a mysterious virus. Search for supplies, craft weapons, and battle creatures.

name: Farmer Wars
description: Farm like you've never farmed before, cause this time you reap a crop of frags. This is Farmer Wars, an FPS where feuding neighbors settle the score once and for all. No such thing as the quiet country life here – choose your weapon of destruction and fight to save your property.

name: Requiem Aeternam Eden
description: A dream-like simulation in which you impersonate Ego, the last of Lilith's children, in a mission down on Earth.

name: Mulligans Golf Game
description: Mulligans Golf Game is an Open Map Arcade Golf Game designed to deliver all the true feelings one gets when playing golf with your friends. The experience has been simplified to allow non golfers to play, but provides depth to challenge those looking for more!

name: LowPolis
description: Build, advance, reshape! For all those who have missed relaxing strategy classics. LowPolis is a friendly-paced city builder game where you become the ruler of a rising community. Begin with a handful of resources and pave your way to a truly majestic kingdom!

name: Super Psy Penguin
description: Super Psy Penguin is a Cyber Penguin Hero Simulator in which you play a realistic Cyber Penguin, giving you the power to save the galaxy! The game is inspired by Parodius and Xenon-II and many other Shmups from our childhoods.

name: Galactic Solo Command
description: In Galactic Solo Command you experience the atmosphere of running a spaceship while trying to return home after the crew has mysteriously disappeared. It's a very dangerous trip, with every jump presenting a challenge with life or death decisions. Prepare your ship!

name: Mythos: Slavic Builder
description: Mythos Slavic Builder is a combination of classic real-time strategy games and it's based on Slavic mythology. Grow your settlement, build up the economy, army and explore maps guarded by mythical creatures & other clans.

name: Cyborgs Attack
description: Cyborgs Attack is a tower defense game, where you as the player, build turrets to stop the invading cyborg forces. The turrets all have 3 upgrade phases to them and do different kinds of damage. From direct single target to splash damage. Will you be able to stop the cyborgs in time?

name: Rebels: Under the Spell of Magic
description: This is the first linear chapter of a longer visual novel game about adventure, fantasy, magic and friendship. There are only a few choices that can be made, and some paths to chose from. The decisions do not have an impact on the ending, instead they provide slightly different content.

name: Another FPS Game
description: Aren't you tired of always playing the same game?

name: Sanctuary Island
description: Dinosaur survival and role play

name: No More Surffer
description: Enter a dark 2d platform style game with choices to speak the truth and the lie it will only depend on the path you want to follow and beware of the ending you will achieve.

name: Xanguito Aventura
description: 2D platform adventure game

name: The Golden Cross
description: The Golden Cross is a plot based game targeted at causal gamers who enjoy a mix of dialogue, action, adventure and puzzles. Or those players that need a break from their intense hard core games. So take a trip back to the basics and easy play. Try the free demo then decide if it's a game for you.

name: Animal Trainer
description: Become an animal trainer. It is a game that faithfully reproduces everything that happens in real work with various animals, domestic and exotic. You will learn how to work to get perfect results.

name: Joe Kowalski Chronicles: Murder in a flat
description: Joe Kowalski Chronicles: Murder in a flat is a dark neo noir point and click adventure game where you start as a police detective Joe Kowalski and try to solve a murder that happened in Joe's neighborhood.

name: Level 20
description: Do you be able to reach level 20? Level 20 is a Roguelike 2D platform game with 20 randomly generated levels, where you need to defeat hordes of robots and collect energy cells to stay stronger and reach the last level.

name: Path to Prosperity
description: Path to Prosperity is a first-person RTS game, allowing you to control your base and people from the ground. Design and build your base, let your workers collect resources and produce goods, and raise armies to fight your competitors. Re-invest your coin wisely and send enough back home to win.

name: Overpower
description: Stack up your gun with unique enhancement, push through worlds of challenging foes to save a friend.

name: Beverage: The Last Call
description: You know the feeling when you wake up after a good ol' fender-bender, and you just have to smash and kick-ass your way through all kinds of creatures of ancient mythologies in order to rescue the gods, and to bring peace back to the earth? That's what Beverage is all about!

name: Lots of guns
description: Lots of guns is a purely FPS game. It is about a story of a dark hero, who was planning to steal the power of 2nd God.

name: Magnace: Arena
description: Magnace: Arena is a sci-fi arena shooter where you fight the bots as heroes from the Magnace universe with their own weapons, characteristics and abilities!

name: Down2Die
description: Down2Die is an advanced zombie survival game that offers many ways of replayability and customization. The game features many ways to counteract your enemies with traps and upgrades. Work together with a team up to 4 survivors and level through the waves to be at your best when the "unknown" occurs.

name: Na.No
description: Pilot your nanobot to defy the bloodstream, the gravity and the physics, unlock new weapons and capabilities from special hormones captured along the way. Fight the various bacteria and menacing virus with a classic gameplay mechanic and save your organism from infection.

name: Monstermoerder
description: You and your team must stay alive and fight through the monsters that just seem to keep coming. All you have are your weapons and the help of your team. As you travel, you must be aware that the monsters will drive you insane.

name: Runlancer
description: Runlancer - dynamic platformer with a changing world and variability of the walkthrough. Solve the mysteries of a secret project and compete with friends!

name: Zango's Shark Adventure
description: Play an epic adventure game as Zango to help him save his family!! Four Chapters to play with 32 unique levels.

name: WaterPolo Inter Nation
description: WIN (WaterPolo Inter Nation) is the very first multiplayer water polo video game! Like any great video game, it combines the need of great game sense, as well as mechanical skill to be able to progress.

name: Cub Gym
description: A challenging and fun crazy scavenger hunt game.

name: Rio Warzone
description: Wotson is a novice soldier in the special services of Rio de Janeiro, he will have to show his worth facing the most dangerous bandits. Seizing drugs and money will be your goals in this game.

name: Mech Farmer
description: A farming-combat RPG set on an alien world - with a space-western vibe. Supply the colonists with crops, help them with personal issues and defend them from hostile alien monstrosities. Full day/night seasonal cycle and fast-paced combat awaits!

name: Abstractanks
description: Abstractanks is an action-packed real-time-strategy game with an abstract theme. Play intense skirmishes with up to sixteen teams, where map-control, positioning, decision-making, speed and a little bit of luck are rewarded.

name: Human vs Monster
description: "Human vs Monster" is a tower defense game similar to Plants vs. Zombies. You need to use humans reasonably to deal with monsters with different characteristics. There are at most five levels for each human or monster, which are-common, advanced, legend, antiquity, and creation.

name: Stream Madness
description: An addicting clicker game that will put you in the shoes of a novice streamer! Condemn everything, gain subscribers and collect donations!

name: No Light
description: When wake up, you in a strange world. You must learn to be strong in this dangerous and dark world. Look for all the materials that can live, light the torch in hand, this light may be the last hope, but don't forget, in this boundless darkness, the light will also let "them" See you.

name: Colony Antares
description: A turned-based strategy card game with light 4X mechanics about building a colony on an alien planet. Explore the world, harvest resources, construct buildings, research technologies, and fight off attacks from alien wildlife. Terraform, Assimilate, or Escape!

name: Fish Memory
description: Fish Memory is a game with beautiful graphics and terrifying music. Puzzle, in the style of "animal", you will like it. The game develops memory well, the goal of the game is to find paired cards in the allotted time. Passing levels you will receive points.

name: Rozalin and the Palace of Flowers
description: Rozalin and the Palace of Flowers is a yuri visual novel about love between three girls while fighting against a curse.

name: Nine Worlds
description: This is a ARPG game, at the same time contains some roguelike elements, players will freely choose to control a body, fight them in the world of monsters, in the world to find the artifact that can help you, defeat the island controller, and finally find the entrance to the next world.

name: Taisho Zombi Roman (Plus)
description: This is an action game where you collect all the keys that have fallen on the stage while avoiding zombies and head to the exit. In arcade mode, you can see the reward CG according to the clear.

name: Advanced Intelligence Surveillance Agency
description: Sir, welcome to the Advanced Surveillance Program. According to the Foreign Domain Surveillance Act signed by the Prime Minister, you will obtain the surveillance authority of KINGSBURY City. You can discover and eliminate threats by creating and deploying surveillance systems throughout the city.

name: Fight
description: This is a shooting game. You can play with your friends in the local area network. Enter your name and the name of the room you want to join, enter the same room with your friends, and you can play against your friends!

name: VR Time Machine Travelling in History: Visit ancient Egypt, Babylon and Greece in B.C. 400
description: The purpose of our game is to let more people know about the great civilizations of ancient Egypt and ancient Greece.

name: Freelance Trucker: Insurance Fraud Edition
description: Driving a big rig in a rigged economy has its risks, but that's why you have insurance.

name: Jeff-16
description: Join the adventure of Jeff the F-16 pilot! Jeff-16 is a fun and challenging obstacle course shooter game where you attempt to fly perfectly through golden rings.You will fly across cities and mountains in an attempts to destroy the evil army who attacked your beloved city.

name: Lang Ji San Guo
description: Sin descripción

name: Xombee
description: First Person Zombie Shooter

name: Mission: In Boxes
description: Mission: In Boxes, as a spy agent, uses clever use of spy gadgets to advance through various gimmick stages. It is a puzzle escape game in VR space aiming at obtaining the target. Enjoy a new sense of VR puzzle escape game!

name: Skinwalkers
description: A Horror Adventure where YOU dictate the ending.

name: Far Fetched
description: Dive into the hazy and cold world of Far Fetched, where dangers lurk in the fog and only the glittering embers of the Traveling Node can keep you safe.

name: Power Ball 2021
description: Power Ball 2021 is here to provide block busting, ball bouncing, gun shooting action for 1 or 2 players. Inspired by great bat and ball games of the past with powerups thrown in to help you defeat the increasingly challenging levels.

name: Vali Victorian
description: ValiVictorian is a first-person horror mystery game that explores the world between our world and where spirits reside.

name: Sol Blanka
description: This is a top down open world turn-based RPG. Eric is a young lone warrior stranded in a strange island in which is inhabited by monsters he's never seen before. Could the Dragon Legends be true, is he dead, or could he still be dreaming? Play and find out as Eric beneath the white sun, Sol Blanka!

name: Blood Bowl 2: Khemri
description: Over 8,000 years ago, the Khemri played the first ever games of Blood Bowl against the Slann. However, as the kingdom died off so too did the game, that was until its rediscovery many centuries later. So with the game’s revival, it was inevitable that these ancient players would return to play again, joined by the legendary Star-Player...

name: Blacksmith Bay
description: Start the smithing shop of your dreams in Blacksmith Bay. Craft weapons to seek fortune and glory in the sleepy town of Port Pleasant. Decorate your shop to attract customers, complete commissions, and unravel the secrets of the Corbots!

name: Tiny Poker
description: Simple and easy to play player poker by yourself. The story mode is just like a novel game. You'll enjoy chatting with her and trying the challenges that she gives you.

name: Wawa United
description: Wawa United is a cooperative adventure platformer with puzzle elements. Play solo or online, team up with fellow frogs, explore a gorgeous world and build the most impressive lair! Your lobby is customizable with rewards you collect during your adventures.

name: Uktena
description: Hunt and topple Gargantuans to keep the enemy at bay in this atmospheric Titan-Rush Game!

name: Dune: Ornithopter Assault
description: First-person flight sim shooter for the GBA. The game was completed, missing a supposed multiplayer mode, But was cancelled when their publisher Cryo Interactive went bankrupt. Its rights would later be acquired by Pixel Games UK and stripped of all direct references to Dune; Renamed "Elland: The Crystal Wars".

name: Half-Life: Dark Matter
description: An upcoming Total Conversion for Half-Life that puts you in the perspective of a Black Operations Assassin, Kovac.

name: Reforged TD
description: Reforged Tower Defense is a genre mix of tower defense and RPG where you can choose from a variety of skills, towers and units. You can decide whether you want to play a round with your friends or force the rankings.

name: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou: Organic Stone
description: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou: Organic Stone is a game released as an add-on via the Satellaview for the slotted cartridge game RPG Tsukuru 2, released for the Super Famicom.

name: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou: Alf to Hakase no Daibouken
description: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou: Alf to Hakase no Daibouken is a game released as an add-on via the Satellaview for the slotted cartridge game RPG Tsukuru 2, released for the Super Famicom.

name: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou Data: Jewel of Live 3
description: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou Data: Jewel of Live 3 is a game released as an add-on via the Satellaview for the slotted cartridge game RPG Tsukuru 2, released for the Super Famicom.

name: Gangster Simulator
description: Have you ever admired the characters from gangster movies? But not the good ones… Now you can play as a real gangster without any consequences.

name: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou Data: BS Kure-kure Mou Race
description: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou Data: BS Kure-kure Mou Race is a game released as an add-on via the Satellaview for the slotted cartridge game RPG Tsukuru 2, released for the Super Famicom.

name: Girls' Last Tour: Book Burning Simulator
description: Get Yuuri to burn as many books as possible without the sleepy Chito noticing!

name: Chasing Demons
description: Chasing Demons is an open-world, choices-matters RPG designed by Randumb Studios, based off of ALL of the previous titles and question-based games combined.

name: Desdemona
description: Gather your courage and face the ghost danger.Clean the curses and hunt the ghost!

name: One Day More
description: An exciting skateboarding adventure awaits you in the fantasy world of a girl named Hannah! One Day More is a game about gaining self-confidence and coping with inner problems.

name: Vain Riser
description: "Vain Riser" is an AVG developed by Team Strrationalism. In the game, girls gather in the Victorian coastal town "Gloden Sand Town" to realize their dream of flying into the blue sky step by step.

name: Dead Covid-19 in space
description: Covid-19 is decreasing the population of the planet earth every day. You are the most seasoned fighter who is ready to sacrifice himself to save the world. You will find out what the secret of the virus is, and find a way to heal it

name: Quarantine Cutz
description: A hilarious cartoon simulation where you're absolutely terrible at cutting hair. Can you overcome your nerves and total pop culture ignorance to give your family a haircut that won't crush their dreams? Probably not, but you're gonna give it your best shot!

name: Ri Ri Ye Ye
description: Sin descripción

name: The Door
description: 你想要明白生命的真正意义吗，想在无尽的世界里游戏吗，想真正的活着吗？ 那么主神空间欢迎您！

name: Escape Zombies At Night
description: This is a doomsday survival escape game.

name: Noah's Ark
description: Welcome to Noah's Ark, a realistic simulator game inspired by stories from Genesis of the Bible. Now it is time for you to be like Noah and build famous vessel, save (hunt) animals and survive during the biggest flood ever. Are you ready for this challenge?

name: Silver Cats
description: In the afterlife world, a fierce struggle began between demons for the right to own the throne. Due to the feuds of the demons, a rift opened into the afterlife world, which turned the country Rain into ruins. Now the guild "Silver Cats" is trying to return the destroyed world to its previous state.

name: Terminal
description: Relax and lose yourself in a beautifully crafted puzzle experience. Solve over 100 hand-made puzzles and uncover the mysteries of love, perseverance, and motivation.

name: Autumn-Chess
description: The single player self-propelled chess game template and experimental works made by myself contain the basic elements of self-propelled chess game. However, due to the lack of funds, the monster setting and ending screen were not done.

name: Spaceslingers
description: Spaceslingers is a mind-bending gravity-based game, where the only obstacles between you and your goal are the most powerful celestial objects in the known universe!

name: Maze Party
description: Well, This is a maze game. Uhh... a game to play with your friends as a party: Exploring the mysterious maze, Racing to be the top or fight against each other. Maze party is an online 2-8 players with various interesting game modes in a theme of "MAZE".

name: A Perfect Day for White Dolphin
description: 改編自乾綠郎的小說《完美的蛇頸龍之日》。 在這個時代，人們可以透過SC裝置和植物人進行感應。 感應淺者知道自己正在虛擬世界之中；感應深者，則會分不清虛幻與現實。 即使如此，黃芷欣還是決定和植物人弟弟芷樂進行感應，她必須找出芷樂自殺的原因。

name: Singles' Generation
description: Singles' Generation is a visual novel story, which follows the life of a group of young friends, including their successes and failures in finding happiness and love, and finding their place in today’s fast-paced, modern world.

name: Zombie Neighborhood
description: Get ready to venture into a fun and sarcastic post-apocalyptic world, in which the goal is to survive the maximum number of days possible while resolving preposterous conflicts between your group's characters.

name: Save the girls Action
description: There are a lot of zombies in the abandoned medieval base, and a lot of girls have disappeared.Beating these zombies might save the girl.

name: Cut Them Up
description: When life gives you endless hordes of infernal enemies, make a mess !

name: Player City
description: Adventure game that integrates 3D semiotics with the real world through videos and photos of the city of Farroupilha (Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil). Take control of the character "Kiwinho" and get to know the sights.

name: Cyberspace: Infinite
description: Cyberspace: Infinity is a strategy-oriented idle game. Multiple automatic combat systems can be easily played without complex operations. Dominate the world with your legendary team, let your enemies know who is the real champion of cyberspace!

name: Curious Alice
description: Experience a world created by illustrator Kristjana S. Williams as you follow your own personal White Rabbit companion, hunt for missing objects, solve the Caterpillar's mind-bending riddles, visit the Queen of Hearts’ croquet garden, and experience classic moments from this legendary tale.

name: Overseer
description: Overseer is a top-down roguelike game, heavily inspired by Dungeon Souls. Play with friends and enjoy the intense splashy combat together. The Overseer system allows you to take control of the dungeon, keep spawning monsters, place traps, and change the layout of the dungeon to spice things up.

name: Shadow Dreams: The Last Thought of Hope
description: Explore a world of psychological issues as the embodiment of the last thought of hope to enter a suicidal mind, a fast magic based first person shooter with a strong emphasis on dealing with emotional trauma.

name: Galaxy Crisis
description: In 2070 AD, the galaxy was invaded by alien civilization, and humans must fight desperately!

name: Don't Mess With Nanny
description: In Don't mess with Nanny there are 2 players, the cranky Nanny and a child. Nanny's objective is to complete multiple tasks in the household while the evil kid tries to stop her at any costs.

name: Swingy boy
description: This is a game about a small blob who has to traverse the cave but all he has is a grappling hook. The swinging of the hook is supposed to simulate swinging it in real life so you need to move your mouse just as you would swing a hook on a rope.

name: God Game
description: Traditional jump climbing game

name: Flykt
description: Flykt is a 4 player online co-op game which players will try to escape from an abandoned hospital. Players will able to choose to play as teams or as impostors to kill their friends. Flykt environment will be generated procedurally. Be silent, move stealth or get killed.

name: Juno
description: An RPG game unique employing elements of strategy and action which forms the genre, saRPG!

name: Try to Remember
description: You have 50 seconds to look around a certain room. The detective will ask you questions about that room. Choose the correct anwer. If you fail 3 times, it's Game Over. If you don't remember something, you can REWIND and go to the same room, being able to look around again for a few seconds.

name: Danger: Escape Lab!
description: Danger: Escape Lab! revolves around a conspiracy theory about current events worldwide. Players impersonate a scientist whose role is to save his own life and possibly millions of others by stopping the outbreak.

name: Wibbly Witches
description: Wibbly Witches is a fast and frantic couch competition for 2-4 players. Navigate evolving arenas and use magic spells to outsmart your opponents in a wyrd and wobbly battle to the death! Only one witch can claim the tiny crown...

name: Chriss Cross
description: Play as best friends: Chriss and Cross.Join their adventure to build a new a club house. Puzzle through the levels to gather the materials needed!

name: Relentless: Ranger
description: Relentless: Ranger is a fantasy rogue-lite action platformer. Slash, shoot, sneak, die, and repeat as the next strider to brave the impossible mission. Unlock disciplines, rescue damsels, and build a better base for your cohort. Choose a new adventure every run.

name: Undead Development 2
description: Your resources are your surroundings. Break down, drag, and nail together furniture to safeguard your home. Explore other regions to restock supplies and weapons. Construct wild defenses by nailing together unlikely objects. Fight against the hordes with online co-op in or out of VR.

name: Carnival VR Orientation
description: Dive into the virtual world of Carnival VR Orientation to improve your VR skills and agility. Play games that enhance your hand-eye coordination, mental agility, and alertness in a fun filled realistic carnival environment.

name: Miting Simulator
description: The miting simulator will make you feel like a revolutionary without leaving your home.

name: Poster Sticker
description: Poster Sticker is a casual Jump´n´Run 3D game, where the player sticks posters with real ads in a small town. Learn new skills, upgrade your equipment, unlock achievements and stick real ads rushing through the zones!

name: Drake's Odds: Survive
description: Play as an alien who must survive on the planet Earth, which is unknown and adverse to him. Fight, craft and make use of the powers and technology in your possession. Collect KP from Earthlings; control the NPCs; fly over the skies and shoot with the spaceship.

name: Colors of the Cube
description: A 2D platformer game about a cube restoring color to a colorless world.

name: Lost Century
description: Run and shoot enemy. You can't stop before enemy down.

name: Racing Bros: Online
description: Welcome to a world with goofy car physics and a lot of crazy modes. This is the ultimate racing game where your 80-year old granny or your 3-year old kid can join you for a ride - Easy to learn, but hard to master! Cop cars, shady cars, firetrucks, sports cars, you name it!

name: The Lost Planet Zenox
description: The Lost Planet Zenox is inspired from an old retro game called "Thrust". You found a mysterious mineral at the asteroid belt of the Zenox Planet. But before bringing it to the earth your ship got attacked by pirates and crushed to the Zenox. Why pirates attacked and how will you get back to Earth?

name: Foglight
description: Survive high risk gameplay as you are pursued by a terrifying monstrosity throughout a perilous open environment. You work to uncover secrets and escape the growing nightmare threatening your life!

name: Cats In Space
description: Cats In Space is adventure game with a storyline. In game you are taking control of two cats. Also you need to move without gravitation. You will have to fight against aliens, avoid traps and collect collectibles.

name: I Borrow
description: I Borrow gives you an opportunity to be a great community member! Annoyingly, you don't own anything. You need to borrow stuff from your surroundings. There is no limit of what you can take, be it a chair, fridge, wall, anything!

name: Magnum Opus
description: Join Magnum Opus the online social multiplayer game and hang out with friends from all around the world! Play multiplayer minigames, meet new people or explore several planets in the vast universe of the metaverse.

name: Chickamauga Battles
description: Refight one of the most significant battles of the American Civil War 'the Battle of Chickamauga'.

name: Christmas Day
description: Christmas Day is a one - day simulator. Just enjoy the atmosphere of Christmas. It's not a game, it's just one room filled with festive comfort and warmth.

name: Apostle 3D
description: Apostle 3D is a throwback to retro shooters of the 90s, Fight your way through the dead, demons , religious fanatics and time to take revenge on those who took your life. Stop the demonic invasion and rest in peace. Controls: WASD Top Number keys: Weapon Switch Mouse

name: I_Darkness
description: Puzzle game in an escape room scenario created using Unreal Engine 4.

name: Kill the Pineapple
description: Kill the Pineapple is a trippy Third Person Shooter in a psychedelic dream-world.

name: The Ways of Uron
description: The Ways of Uron is a top-down Action-Adventure RPG in a fantasy setting. Travel to exotic lands to discover relics, recruit new friends, and solve the mystery of Garen's past.

name: Chora
description: "Chora" is Virtual Reality Zombie FPS Game. The world has returned to the age of Apocalypse due to the zombie virus outbreak. You are a survivor in 'Daejeon' which is Science city in korea. Beat the zombies and Turn on the 'Core-tan' and end the zombie apocalypse.

name: Extreme Stream Power
description: In future space everywhere is full of danger, the alien invasion, the betrayal of artificial intelligence, chemical and biological weapons cause, you then joined the practice qigong and martial arts school, the students practise every day to improve their own ability,

name: Space Junk Heroes
description: Nostalgic 2D Hand drawn action adventure game, set in space, Featuring high octane gameplay that`s exploding with attitude

name: Lost
description: Lost is a with Chinese style mysterious unreal story is setting, contain all sorts of Chinese style ghost legend and content card card player of Rougelike adventure game ACTS the vagabonder that loses memory, set foot on unknown journey.

name: Performer
description: Performer is a game with fun puzzles. Test your logic and ingenuity in different locations of the world as a mercenary who has to eliminate goals or steal secret developments.

name: Hyper Psychic Gauntlets
description: You uncover an ancient artifact that grants you telekinetic powers, and in doing so awaken its guardians to prove your worth as its wielder. Smash your way through your enemies as you uncover the hidden powers of your artifact.

name: Hell Pub
description: 这是一款独一无二的策略rpg游戏，难度和标题都是地狱级的。 您需要组织一支4人战队，去通过冥王试炼。您的对手实力恐怖是不会让您失望的。 从来没有人类能走到最后，这次轮到您上场了。来接受一次终极考验吧。 当您击败血量 伤害都是几倍于您的对手，您会爱上这款游戏的。

name: Castle Heck
description: Castle Heck is a procedurally generated dungeon crawler that combines elements you love from Metroidvania with the chaos of Enter the Gungeon.

name: Dying Byte Survival
description: Dying Byte Survival is a Gun-Fu shooter with a variety of weapons, Slow motion effect, Diving, Cloak of Invisibility and very detailed particle and effect system in a Open World with closed quarters but also open fields, with storyline and persistent gameplay.

name: Yakuza Cats
description: Yakuza Cats is a graphic adventure set in a 100% feline Tokyo. This original world mixes Ukiyo-e art with Gen Z aesthetics. It is a coming of age story that puts the player through different ethical choices while tackling themes such as identity and prejudice.

name: Elizabeth's Score
description: Help Elizabeth on her journey through an unfamiliar world as she battles with herself, in this tightly tuned, hand-crafted platformer.

name: Dino Dungeon
description: Dino Dungeon is a 2D physics puzzle platformer with 4 playable characters. Carry and Kick each other to victory in order to escape your demise!

name: Aster fpv
description: Aster fpv is a racing and shooting drone simulator, players can compete in races or shoot themselves with a rocket launcher or submachine gun, or simply train to fly an fpv drone

name: Micromanagement
description: You're bacteria. Luckily, you have psychic powers! Control your mutation to overwhelm and conquer. Gain amazing abilities for both tactical and strategic advantage. You'll need them all because this microcosmic world has a new threat...

name: M.U.S.T. Repeat
description: M.U.S.T. Repeat is a logical puzzle game in which tiny robot Q.T. uses the Repeat mechanic to navigate the rooms and defeat enemies. The higher the Repeat is, the more difficult it is to navigate through the room, but you have to increase your Repeat in order to defeat the higher level Guard Bots.

name: Alek
description: Post-soviet Russia, Tyumen in 1995. Alexey Smirnov, a local shot-caller, nicknamed 'Alek' found out about the death of his friends and swore to avenge. The bloody war started between the gangs of the city. However, a true enemy turned out not to be common gangsters, but men much scarier

name: The Maze: Humanity
description: An immersive multiplayer VR RPG filled with adventure and heart pounding action. A dynamic experience in an apocalyptic realm. Will you enter The Maze to defend humanity?

name: Ancient Worlds: Egypt
description: Rewrite history and rule Ancient Egypt in this retro-inspired city-building game.

name: Cyber Psychosis
description: Cyber Psychosis is a pseudo-3D dynamic first-person shooter in a cyberpunk setting with a lot of enemies, blood and drive

name: Freedom: How I Escaped
description: This is your chance. The time has come to put oppression in your past. The escape plan is ready, but you must avoid all surveillance and run undetected. Its time to make your own path. To make your own future. Its now or never.

name: At the Downstairs
description: What, you can easily pass all the obstacles you face? So, are you our last hope? So, do you want some absurdity? And are you doing all this to beat the ZUMBEKUKKA at downstairs? Dude, you are really brave!

name: Aenaon
description: It's time to compete in the ancient Olympic Games, but apart from sports, you also have to prepare your spirit. We welcome you to ancient Greek culture!

name: Zeko
description: A calm and cute original puzzle game. Clear stages to unlock the next one. Each stage has its own challenge.

name: Rooster Rampage
description: Rooster Rampage is a chicken based zombie shooter. Engage your inner chicken in the single player campaign to fend off hordes of zombies across amazing chicken inspired worlds, or locate a nearby Rampage in action!![

name: The Build and Race Hotrod Game
description: Build and race a hotrod car.First you pick up parts from a waiting train using a truck and fork lift.Assemble car in a workshop using a crain Drive to the raceway with your hotrod.The russian mafia will try to stop you from entering a race.Race against other cars in a very demandig 5 lap race.

name: Path to Light
description: Have you seen my light?

name: Town of the Dead Life
description: Town Of The Dead Life is an independent game with the background of eschatology. Players will play the role of one of the few surviving humans in the end of the world, surviving in difficult conditions and trying to change the fate of the world.

name: MV Mazes
description: MV Mazes - A 2D game, where you need to find a way out of the mazes.

name: Blind Descent
description: Blind Descent is a multiplayer open-world survival adventure game with up to 4 players set in the Martian underground.

name: Universe999999
description: Universe sandbox simulation game.

name: Jurassic Extinction
description: Survive an island, in an unknown time and place. Encounter dinosaurs, humans, and find a way back home, fight and kill to find your way...

name: Soldier
description: The Soldier mission is destroy monsters inside the abandoned Village.

name: Luto
description:
Luto is a first person psychological horror narrative experience where you will embody a person unable to exit his own house. Finding the way to leave it will lead you through a series of paths that will challenge your senses.

Explore the pain caused by the loss of a loved one, the horror of the insecurity to the deepest darkness hidden behind anxiety and depression...

name: Tout Savoir: 3E
description: Sin descripción

name: PaintOut!
description:
- Take an art break! -
A unique mono-color art puzzle game!
Relax with some piano, art, and puzzles!

name: Blue Sabers: Early Mission
description: Use conventional and three types of special weapons to overcome difficult situations. Take control of the battlefield with support aircraft! Long-established STG development team, Blue&White, the first new one in 13 years, and a new origin!

name: The Owl and Lighthouse
description: Sin descripción

name: The Adventures of Zozo
description: Sin descripción

name: Curupon
description: Sin descripción

name: Clioneko
description: Sin descripción

name: Arsène Lupin: Gentleman Bomber
description:
Back in 1905 one of the most prolific, daring and dazzling thief was starting his career. He is none other than Arsène Lupin, the gentleman thief.
This is his untold story, a story of bold action, disguise and thievery.
Embody 8 of the most iconic characters of the series, and if you're lucky, you'll discover some hidden gems. Take your character through 6 different maps representing both defining moments of Arsène's story and cultural French beacons. Each level has its own
strong audio theme. Choose among 5 different game modes, each with their own set of objectives and gimmicks representing Arsène's different skills and sides, from gentleman to thief.
In any case, be sure to bomb your opponents before they bomb you!

name: Yokaze
description: Yokaze is an indie game label that takes you to new worlds full of emotion.

name: Taxi in the Rain
description: Sin descripción

name: Monochro
description:
Monochro is an action-platformer game
about a person using unique weapons and air-dash.

name: Shadow Seeker
description:
Amorita Town, a sleepy location filled with peaceful residents and gloomy scenery.

You are Carlos Ramirez, a seasoned Detective who has experience in many different kinds of cases and investigations. On a fated day, you come face to face with a case you have never witnessed before. A very mysterious and tragic murder of a family that lived in the outskirts of the town. Something about it is not right, it makes you feel extremely uneasy, and almost, unsure.

As your mission deepens, the mystery appears to be shrouded in an evil like never before. What awaits you will tear you down and shake you to your core, an ancient darkness arises from the shadows. Enter the Shadow Seeker.

name: Eva Dawn
description: Eva Dawn, is an ARPG mobile game developed and published by Sina Games. An original story with settings from Neon Genesis Evangelion, with smooth animations, crafted graphics and tons of missions. Customize your own characters and fight your battles.

name: Mirror House Cornflake
description: Mirror House Cornflake is a tech demo for the Nintendo 64. It was found in the source code leak that took place on May 3, 2020. It's a game about a very hungry boy lost in an amusement park maze looking for food.

name: Panel de Pon GB
description: Panel de Pon GB is a canceled game for the Game Boy Color. The game was mostly a port of Panel de Pon (SFC), but with a new story and some elements from the cancelled Panel de Pon 64, which later resurfaced via the Nintendo Puzzle Collection compilation for the Gamecube. The game was eventually cancelled and turned into Pokémon de PanePon. However, most of the game data still remains inside of the Pokémon de PanePon rom.

name: The Dreambox
description: Inspired by project spark and dreams, The Dreambox Allows you to create anything you can possibly imagine! The sky is the limit. You can code, sculpt, paint, draw, rig, animate, make music, make games, etc. Everyone has a sense of imagination and creativity. Time to push the boundaries of what you can do!

name: Man vs Machine
description:
Man Vs Machine is a platformer game brings an old idea like platforming and brings them into modern takes.

It follows the story of two scientists having their bots stolen and used for malicious intent from bandits.

Can you stop these bandits before it's too late and they take over?

name: Lifeflame Compendium
description: Lifeflame Compendium is a WarBreedFarm RPG, farm crops, breed animals and wage war or peace in an expansive open world adventure.

name: Mean Girls
description: Mean Girls is a game for the Nintendo DS that is based on the movie of the same name. The game is notable for it's status of lost media, with it being the most well known case of a lost game in the lost media community. The game was planned to be published by 505 Games with a release date of September 11th, 2009 in Europe and April 20th, 2010 in United States, but was canceled at the last minute.

name: Ducklings IO
description: A game where you play as a duck collecting ducklings to get upgrades to your nest.

name: Infinite Sky
description: Infinite Sky is an action adventure game with a focus on flight-based platforming. Travel across floating lands over an endless sky. Complete the trials ahead of you before it all collapses beneath your feet.

name: Dragon Quest XII: The Flames of Fate
description: The Flames of Fate is the twelfth mainline title in the Dragon Quest series and the first title aimed at older mature players.

name: Insula: Bounty Royale
description: Insula: Bounty Royale is a fast-paced, intense PvP arena shooter with heavy PvE elements. A fully intertwined story advanced by accomplishments in the multiplayer arenas and some of the most addictive high octane aerial combat to be found, make for a truly unique play experience.

name: Orbatron
description: Orbatron is an exciting game that will test your reflexes, focus, and spatial reasoning.Collect orbs, chain combos, and develop strategies to master each unique level.

name: Ellie's Travel Diary
description: Ellie’s Travel Diary is a sightseeing VR game where you can travel to miniature versions of Korea’s famous landmarks with Ellie and his family and immerse yourself in numerous experiences. Switching between 3rd-person to 1st-person views, you can freely visit Korea’s beautiful landmarks and enjoy the cultural experiences.

name: Last Visit
description: Last Visit is a combination of an adventure game and survival horror. Discover a captivating story full of secrets and fear. Dark atmosphere, constant sense of danger and various puzzles will make you never forget this experience.

name: Lord BullFrog
description: Action RPG in a third-person perspective set in a dark fantasy world on the counter called the New World, the counterpart of South America.

name: SuperTanks
description: Battle against friends using tanks and their weapons. Find bonuses on map and use them to your adventage. All tanks can use bullets, lasers, bombs, temporary speed or special sphere where bullets are slower. Game can be streamed on Twitch and other streaming platforms.

name: Encycle
description: A slightly hallucinogenic puzzle platformer.

name: The Dragon Sword
description: 明朝末年，朝政腐敗，魏忠賢獨攬大權，大肆誅殺異己，前錦衣衛指揮使聶玉弓因不忍枉殺忠良，得罪了奸臣魏忠賢，遭其陷害以致家破人亡。抗金名將袁崇煥上奏摺稱頌魏忠賢的功德，相反魏忠賢派使其黨羽以袁崇煥不救錦州為由，彈劾袁崇煥，從此揭開了一場鬥智鬥力的曲折開端……

name: Traffic V
description: Traffic V - Take command of the traffic in the streets, redirecting cars, and telling them when it is okay to stop, and when it is okay to go. One big game of Red light green light keeps you on your feet in this addicting traffic driving game.

name: The Sole Survivor
description: If You Survive So Your A SOLE SURVIVOR,

name: Pirate Simulator
description: Start a rebellious career as a poor sailor and climb your way up to become the richest and the most dangerous captain of the archipelago. Take over sea routes, set up hideouts, build fleets and fight enemy crews to lead a legendary pirate life!

name: Down in the Dark
description: The world has been plunged into a darkness of chaos and violence. The streets of the city are teeming with ruthless rapists and murderers. Get ready for frantic battles, wild chases, puzzles, upgrades and discover new characters in each chapter of this action-packed detective story.

name: Sudoku Dreams
description: Simple Experiment game of Sudoku.

name: Carom Billiards
description: Carom Billiards is the most realistic and closest to reality French billiards simulation

name: Break It Down
description: Advanced Destruction Physics | Everything is Destructible

name: I am Dictator
description: Become dictator of the only country that does not yield to the world's superpowers. Use your skills to build an army, care for your people, provide wealth and gain worldwide respect. You're a natural-born leader and the best diplomat. We await your orders, Sir!

name: Dirty Cop Simulator
description: The life of a young cop, meaning parking tickets, checking speeds, vandals and petty thieves, can bore anyone. Can you resist the temptation or will you go down the path full of money and adrenaline?

name: Hana's Campus Life!
description: What does one do when a girl appears, claiming to be a god? For college student Jeong Lee-Han, his life suddenly becomes turned upside down by the appearance of the god, Hana. A supernatural love comedy visual novel with multiple endings.

name: Fusion Relics
description: Fusion Relics: A 2D side-scrolling, creature collector, RPG platformer with arcade hack and slash mechanics, hand drawn art, and character customization, where you battle giant titans, hatch unique creatures, and restore the balance between Light and Dark to a corrupted world!

name: Woebegone Woods
description: Woebegone Woods is a casual worker placement game with a focus on relationship building. Enter the Woebegone Woods, a small, warm village in the middle of a cold and remote forest!

name: PitBots
description: Physics based combat game where you design a robot and fight in the arena. Crush, flip, pierce, burn and cut your opponents till the last part. Create superior fighting machines and dominate the arena.

name: Guns N Stuff
description: A top down shared screen local multiplayer game allowing for battles between you and your friends as well as co-op game play against waves of endless zombies.

name: Devil's Dream
description: In Devils's Dream you play as James, a student which want to examine an abandoned place. He and his girlfriend Sophie drove in the late of the Night to the place and get what they hadn't expected. Try to Survive Night. and dont forgot you cannot hide or run from him.

name: Spirit Land
description: SPIRIT LAND Possesses special features of a top RPG Southeast Asia. PLAY NOW! The Leader Of Endless Battles & Becoming The Legend In Our Story

name: The Hilltop Mansion
description: Can you escape from this cursed mansion? Rely on the clues left by the ancestors to break the curse of the mansion and survive through it!

name: The Steps as We Know Them
description: Use the moves of chess to solve puzzles. Find your way with six different pieces, through six different worlds. Use a varying way of thinking in each world.

name: Timmy's Nightmare
description: Timmy's Nightmare is an Action-Rogue-Lite taking place in a nightmarishly dark realm, where it's Timmy versus the Lil Terrors, in an all-out brawl for survival as you hunt for his most priced toy, the stuffed bear. All while being the same size as a Baseball. Will you survive?

name: Demelia's Isle
description: You just woke up on a beach. Simply trying to survive, you find yourself immersed in a quest against the demonic forces that are awakening again in this isolated kingdom.

name: Late Stage Inferno
description: Hunt down those responsible for destroying your home. Sneak through ships and kill everyone on board. Climb the ranks until you find reach the top, then take it out. Play out the short story of this alien stuck in a capitalist hell as they take on 8 unique ships.

name: Minforiga
description: Minesweeper with a character! Dig down to the center of the earth and mend the core crystal before it's too late.

name: Where's My Phone?!
description: Where's My Phone?! is a casual, life-simulation game. Run around your house cleaning, getting ready for work, or decorating for your anniversary.

name: Demon Zombie Outpost
description: Demon Zombie Outpost is a 60 + zombie kills 1 level game.

name: Risu
description: Risu is a story-driven, survival horror adventure game. Her new home hides a dark secret; Risu Ishikawa must traverse, solve, and survive a hellish architectural-maze of endless personal nightmares, but what lies at the center?

name: Before Dark
description: With a short battery life and no jumping, how can you survive this world of darkness and bring it back to life? In this platformer, precision and patience are crucial to survival.

name: Space Station 14
description: Disasters, enemies, and incompetence conspire to make each shift aboard the station a unique and hellish experience. Sign up today to explore intricate game mechanics and enjoy limitless player interaction! (Nanotrasen Inc. is not responsible for injury, death, or worse).

name: Master Blaster VR
description: Master Blater VR brings the thrill of cricket to Virtual Reality in an Arcade mode, bringing fast paced action to your living room. Using a challenging gameplay mode and an intelligent AI system Master Blaster VR is a cricket expereince meant to be enjoyed by fans of the sport of all ages.

name: Freed Soft
description: Freed Soft is an it company simulator. You have to build your own IT Empire. Develop your character and your employees. Create the best SOFTWARE in the game world.

name: Black Blade
description: A story about main character lose his love and started the journey of revenge, after many difficult challenges he finally made it, but he will find revenge is not the answer.

name: Puzzle Guys
description: Puzzle Guys is an adventure puzzle game in which you have to control 4 characters at once.

name: Chronicles of Lilith
description: You've been cursed, you've been betrayed. Now it's time for vengeance ! Journey through various lands to find your oppressor - Lilith. Be prepared as the journey will be a bloodshed. Kill whatever is in your path to find the ones that destroyed your life !

name: Space Roaming
description: Space roaming is a casual level game and parkour game, accompanied by laid-back music, constantly running forward. Faced with various obstacles, you need to consider the way to pass the game skillfully or flexibly. Of course, smooth levels are the fun of this game.

name: Super Pixel World
description: A fun platformer game, where you're after a "friend" that owes you money, you'll find or buy abilities, discover new exits until you defeat the final boss, so you can set your friend free... Or not?

name: Lost Dunes
description: Lost Dunes, the RPG, Exploration, Combat, Building game, explore the ancient dunes, help the locals, build pyramids, fight, and get your revenge on the bandits who pillaged your home!

name: Arcano
description: Arcano is an over the top action adventure in VR. Playing as a secret agent, you'll make the impossible possible. Slow-motion shootouts and crazy stunts at a variety of exciting locations — all with online co-op.

name: Side Effect
description: Side Effect is a first person exploration game that takes you to a waste covered island to fight pollution one garbage at a time. Team up with wild animals, discover hidden stories and defeat monster called pollution once and for all.

name: False Dichotomy
description: Survive to return to your grieving wife. Face your sins. Kill demons. Save lives.

name: Hell Shuffle
description: A driving mix of rogue-like card deckbuilder and turn-based strategic combat. Join one of the three factions, craft a unique deck, set up a squad, use a variety of talents, trinkets, items, and a perk tree to wipe out the debauched angelic Protectors again and again.

name: Rocket Panda Panic
description: It's a Panda-emic! Spreading across the globe causing panic and fear. Only one hero has the courage, power and cuteness to save us all. Join Pandy and his jetpack as they travel the world, protecting us from the critter panda plague.

name: Rundom
description: RUNDOM is a "human" racing game. Sprint, slide, blink, travel through portals and more just to be faster and earn your victory!

name: Centrifugal
description: Navigate your rocket through the universe by using the centripetal and centrifugal forces! Wander around the stars and find your way home! Explore what's hidden at the end of the galaxy and have fun with your friends!

name: Cranky Cannon
description: A quirky challenging puzzle game! How many levels can you master?

name: Nosferatu's Butler
description: A surveyor breaks into a mysterious and sinister Mansion on Pleasant Street in order to find his missing sister. She was last seen being interviewed by the mansion's young and mysterious Butler.

name: Unity Chan and Cube World!!
description: Unity Chan and Cube World!! is a Mario-like 3D platform game, in which rich and difficult traps and monsters are designed. Let's help the kawaii and naughty heroine - Unity Chan to defeat these stages one by one!

name: The Sewers
description: As you are having a rest in your humble abode you have the urge that something is present, something dangerous. Now you trust the urge and decide it's time to leave. You've been pushing your luck for too long down here. As you walk to exit this place you once called home, your urge becomes a reality.

name: Just a Flu
description: Just A Flu is a strategy simulation game about fighting the deadly fast spreading disease. Decide how to deal with infected people, when to close transport hubs, declare quarantine, or lockdown. Can you not only stop pandemic but avoid panic and not destroy the economy, causing more harm?

name: Toybox
description: Hundreds of packs, thousands of items. Can you collect them all?

name: Angelwood
description: As another ordinary year at St. Gregory's High School approaches, student John Smith finds out that a mafia has been controlling his town in the shadows. By joining the Honors Community Outreach, his friends and he will try to expose the mafia's crimes.

name: Ichth.ys
description: Ichth.ys is a visual novel with turn-based combat where your choices affect the story! You follow Fraser, a hacker who was recently expelled from university, in a tale of mystery, deception, censorship, freedom, and board game cafes!

name: Valiantia
description: Valiantia is a role-playing game. Solve the puzzles. Altis, a female knight, and you, Leonale as her confidant, were ordered to do missions. You can help her ease the problems, making the decision, or make them more complicated. Her fate depends on you.

name: Celestial Empire
description: The Emperor has chosen you as a new provincial governor. It is now your duty to maintain peace and prosperity in the region. Design the city of your dreams, trade with other landlords and take care of your people’s needs. Ensure their survival through harsh winters and disasters ravaging the land.

name: Tales of Herring Lake
